thread.title: Cities of the future: The big shift to ‘Smart’
thread.title_full: Cities of the future: The big shift to ‘Smart’

title: Cities of the future: The big shift to ‘Smart’
text:
30 Cities of the future: The big shift to ‘Smart’ 
Statescoop: For nearly a century, rising skyscrapers, expanding business districts and swelling populations were reason enough for a city to be considered successful.Flourishing urban centers were feats of structural engineering and hubs of culture. They were spatially efficient and brimming with opportunity. Gauging the “intelligence” of a city was a matter of taking stock of the sophistication of its layout and design.
